title: Community Board Meeting
description: Monthly community board meeting to discuss ongoing projects, community concerns, and upcoming initiatives. All residents welcome.

title: Summer Concert: Pocono Folk Trio
description: Enjoy an evening of traditional folk music with the talented Pocono Folk Trio. Bring your lawn chairs and blankets!

title: Lake Cleanup Day
description: Annual volunteer lake cleanup day. Help keep our lakes beautiful! All supplies provided, lunch included for volunteers.

title: Summer Concert: Jazz on the Lake
description: Contemporary jazz ensemble performing lakeside. Food trucks available starting at 6:00 PM.

title: Children's Fishing Derby
description: Annual fishing contest for kids 12 and under. Prizes for biggest fish, most fish, and participation. All equipment provided.

title: Summer Concert: Summer's End Band
description: Close out our summer concert series with classic rock covers from Summer's End Band. Final concert of the season!

title: Labor Day Picnic
description: Community-wide Labor Day celebration with games, food, and activities for the whole family. Potluck style - bring a dish to share!

title: Fall Newsletter Submission Deadline
description: Deadline for submitting articles, photos, and announcements for the fall issue of The Courier newsletter.
location: Submit via email or community office

title: Community Yard Sale
description: Annual community-wide yard sale. Reserve your spot early! Maps will be available at the entrance.

title: Fall Foliage Photography Walk
description: Guided photography walk to capture the beautiful fall colors around our lakes. All skill levels welcome, bring your camera or phone.
